__e: I thought you'd like to know, that I've decided revenge is a pitiful pursuit and a waste of my fleeting time, so...
Darling, would you laugh at me? She seems so miserable and we are so happy, you and I.
You can say that I'm pathetic and needy and I can't say anything to you?
There is nothing more pathetic than needing someone.
Listen, and I'm only telling you this because you look so pathetic right now it makes me want to physically...
Don't you think it's pathetic that because of your father you get to do school again?
